abstract: Crowd of 50,000 march along Reforma Avenue in Mexico City to protest 2014 disappearance of 43 young men, students at Ayotzinapa teachers' college; authorities have identified remains of only one student, Alexander Mora, and have arrested 111 people connected to incident; protesters reject federal prosecutors claim that all students are dead and ask Pres Enrique Pena Nieto to follow investigative leads suggested by outside panel of experts.
lead_paragraph: This weekend families of the missing are commemorating the disappearance of their sons, all students at a teachers’ college in Ayotzinapa, in rural Guerrero State.

headline.main: Against Odds, Seeking Hope for Mexican Students Who Vanished a Year Ago
headline.print_headline: Against Odds, Seeking Hope for Mexican Students Who Vanished a Year Ago

snippet: This weekend families of the missing are commemorating the disappearance of their sons, all students at a teachers’ college in Ayotzinapa, in rural Guerrero State.
